home.title: Mango Disease Detector
home.uploadPrompt: Upload or Take a photo of your leaf

alerts.permissionRequired: Permission required to access media library!
alerts.apiError: Error analyzing image. Please try again.

diseases.anthracnose: Anthracnose is a fungal disease affecting many plants. It causes dark, sunken lesions and thrives in humid environments.
diseases.powderyMildew: Powdery mildew is a white, powdery fungal growth on leaves and stems. It thrives in dry, warm conditions with high humidity.
diseases.bacterialCanker: Bacterial Canker causes black lesions and cracks on stems and leaves, leading to wilting and defoliation.
diseases.sootyMold: Sooty Mold is a black fungal coating on leaves caused by insect honeydew. It blocks sunlight and reduces photosynthesis.
diseases.dieBack: Die Back causes progressive death of shoots and branches, often due to fungal infection or environmental stress.

learn.title: Learn about Mango Diseases
learn.description: Explore various mango diseases, their symptoms, and treatment options. Click on a disease to learn more.
